name: Age of Chaos
description:
Read all the way through for controls

Age of Chaos is an epic, story-driven experience in which players will take control of Knil, a brave knight, to fight the forces of Chaos controlled by Rotsa, Harbinger of CHAOS.

Controls:

WASD to move.

Left click to swing your sword (sword swings in a 6-hit combo).

Right click in the middle of a combo to do a strong attack (doing this at different times causes different attacks, some are better than others).

Press space to dodge;
